short_summary: Replacing existing seats on Maritime Region, Conservation & Protection Rosborough 881 rigid hull inflatable boats (RHIBs).
description: The Canadian Coast Guard has a requirement to procure (16) marine suspension seats.
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement: F5134-220816
#### Marine Suspension Seats for the Canadian Coast Guard
********************************************************************************
Status: Tender Closed (Expired)
********************************************************************************

### Tender Details
| **Field**                        | **Content**                                      |
|------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------|
| **Tender Reference**               | WS3850897712                                       |
| **Tender Status**                  | Expired (Tender Closing Date)                    |
| **Solicitation Number**            | WS3850897712                                       |
| **Publication Date**               | June 27, 2023                                    |
| **Tender Closing Date**            | July 25, 2023, 14:00:00                          |
| **Expected Contract Start Date**   | July 28, 2023                                     |
| **Expected Contract End Date**     | N/A                                              |
| **Procurment Category**            | Goods and Services                                |
| **Notice Type**                    | Request for Proposal                               |
| **Procurement Method**             | Competitive - Open bidding                        |
| **Selection Criteria**             | Lowest Price                                       |
| **Trade Agreements**               | Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)              |
| **Region of Opportunity**          | None                                              |
| **Region of Delivery**             | Nova Scotia                                      |

### Undelrying Requirements
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Canadian Coast Guard wishes to procure 16 marine suspension seats for its boats. The purpose of the request is to replace the existing seats on 4 Rigid Hull Inflatable Boats (RHIB) that require rapid movement and shock absorption.

### Contracting Entity
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------++

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) acts as the contracting entity. 

### Contact 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Interested parties can reach out to Dale (SPAC/PSPC) or Dale (SPAC/PSPC) with the following contact information:

- Email: dale.wadden@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
